content.raw:
The bounding box values may be returned in the world frame. So, I would guess that Atlas is starting roughly at 50m on the z-axix, -38 on the y, and -3 on the x.

There is a bug in `Entity::GetCollisionBoundingBox`. The function assumes the presence of child elements, so it will only work for Models and Links. I'll submit a pull-request to gazebo to fix this.
